Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
16.08.2011 SH SCR16682 BXA320A is now submitted in MGSRVN_MAX
04.01.2006 SH SCR10018 Added PI.SPECIALDELIVERY and PI.PRINTERQUEUE
to argument list of BXA320A
04.05.2005 SH SCR8271 Update PI.DATE for BXA320A with GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE
, before GNRL_ACTIVEDATE was used
06.01.2005 SH SCR7560 Added test to perform BXA320A only if there at least one
DCMC row exists for the selected clients
30.03.2004 SH SCR5836 Added DBSQL WhereClause for the selection of COUT rows
- enabled multiple calls of BXA320A for the same reporttype with different
- COUT202_FREQCODE, regarding to the settings in table CALD
10.03.2004 SH SCR5678 Changed call to BXA320A to use GB701
05.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA320A
-- Uses for the selection of COUT rows
-- If still TCOD rows where TCOD_REPORTTYPE = 'DBA' or 'DBF' exists in TCOD than
-- it's a restart and only for those clients XML has to be produced
-- Otherwise create new TCOD rows for the clients
-- Build DBSQL WhereClause for the selection of COUT rows
... for monthly requests
... for 2 weekly requests
... for weekly requests
... for daily requests
-- If one of the above request = 'Y' then the range on COUT202_REPORTTYPE
-- with 'DBA' or 'DBF' has to be added, otherwise no XML has to be produced
-- See DBSQL WhereClause
-- Check if there exists at least one DCMC row for this client
... only if exists XML has to be produced
-- Direct call to BXA320A uses for cross reference and testing purposes

Header.Description: Check if DCMC exist for client

FormName.valUnicode: Check if DCMC exist for client
